DOC.brief_summary: The utilization of everolimus-eluting coronary stents in a coronary artery diseases is effective in reducing both repeat revascularization and major adverse cardiac events within two year follow-up. To evaluate the procedural, short and long term clinical outcomes of multiple everolimus-eluting coronary stent implantation in long (>30mm) coronary lesions.
